oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Verbal history of Erie Community College
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Presented here is a reproduction of the audio content of James E. Shenton's A Verbal History of Erie Community College. These recordings were produced in 1982 as six audio cassettes along with a type-written transcript and outline of the tapes' contents.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Shenton, James E.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Erie Community College (N.Y.); Oral history--New York (State)--Erie County; Community colleges--New York (State)--Erie County.
Education
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: New York (State), Western; Erie County (N.Y.); Buffalo (N.Y.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Barrey, Margaret A. (Analog Recording Engineer); Best, Matthew M. (Digital Reproduction Engineer)
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: Verbal History of Erie Community College

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: History of Erie Community College: 1946-1974, original transcript
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Presented here is a reproduction of the original typed transcript of James E. Shenton's Verbal History of Erie Community College. It was first produced in 1982 along with an outline and six corresponding audio recordings. The transcript was reproduced digitally in 2011 using optical character recognition (OCR). The OCR results were proofread and corrected to match the text as it was originally typed. Any grammatical, typographical, or spelling errors were retained from the original. The results are a fully searchable document that looks just as it did when it was created in 1982.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Shenton, James E.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Erie Community College (N.Y.); Community colleges--New York (State)--Erie County.
Education
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: New York (State), Western; Erie County (N.Y.); Buffalo (N.Y.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Barrey, Margaret A. (Typist); Best, Matthew M. (Digital Reproduction Engineer)
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Typed transcript : title page, 54 p. ; 22 cm. Typed transcript : title page, 54 p. ; 22 cm. x 28 x 28
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: Verbal History of Erie Community College

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: History of Erie Community College: 1946-1974, corrected transcript
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Presented here is the corrected text of the original transcript of A Verbal History of Erie Community College by James E. Shenton. The corrected text was produced in 2011 by Matthew Best to correct typographical and spelling errors that existed in the original typewritten transcript. The spelling of names of people and places were researched and adjusted to improve historical accuracy of the transcript. A larger font was also selected to improve readability. May be searched by word or phrase.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Shenton, James E.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Erie Community College (N.Y.); Community colleges--New York (State)--Erie County.
